extension.name: Manual Direct Debit
extension.description: This extension provides a back-office Direct Debit management process that is compatible to AUDDIS based Direct Debit processing platforms such as PT-X. Please note this extension requires https://github.com/compucorp/uk.co.compucorp.membershipextras as a dependency.
extension.comments: Supported CiviCRM versions: Please check Membershipextras extension info file for more details
